title: Synergetics wins the FY24 Superstar Campaign Award
description: Synergetics India wins the FY24 Superstar Campaign Award by Microsoft for its significant contributions in technological innovation, training over 10,000 certified students, leading in 'Learning Achievement badges activation', and achieving highest sales in examination vouchers, highlighting their commitment to excellence and cutting-edge solutions
content: Synergetics India, a prominent Microsoft Partner, has been honored as the winner of the FY24 Superstar Campaign Award by Microsoft. This prestigious award recognises Synergetics India's outstanding contributions to advancing technological innovation and delivering impactful solutions to businesses globally.The FY24 Superstar Campaign Award is a recognition of Synergetics India's commitment to train more than 10,000+ certified students nationwide, leading in "Learning Achievement badges activation", and achieving the highest sales of examination vouchers this year. Its commitment to excellence is validated by certifications such as Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate and Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity, demonstrating the companyâ€™s dedication to staying at the forefront of technological advancements.Ashvini Shahane, president of the learning services division at Synergetics India, said, "We are thrilled to receive the FY24 Superstar Campaign Award from Microsoft. This recognition highlights our team's dedication to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in technological innovation and delivering impact. It motivates us to continue innovating and delivering exceptional value to our clients".
